section.title:
purchase orders printing vendor form
forms for vendors
vendors p/o forms for Print Vendor Form
section.para: To print a Vendor Form, select the "Print Vendor Form" option. The following screen will appear:
When printing a Vendor Form, you are presented with the following options:

listitem.para: Enter the Vendor number of the Vendor whose Form you want to print.
Specify the Form you want to use for printing the Vendor information.

section.para: To the far right of the screen, the following buttons are available:

listitem.para: Closes the screen without generating a report, returning you to the application desktop.
Runs the report associated with this screen.
